name: 蔡銘修
objective: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
schedule:
01 02/24 Intro(research topic)
02 03/03 Endnote
03 03/10 Prospectus
04 03/17 Writing Summaries-1
05 03/24 Writing Summaries-2
06 03/31 Research Introduction-1
07 04/07 no class
08 04/14 Research Introduction-2(turn in Introduction)
09 04/21 Midterm Week
10 04/28 Research Literature Review(turn in Literature Review)
11 05/05 Research Method-1
12 05/12 Research Method-2(turn in Method)
13 05/19 Research Result and Discussion-1(turn in Result)
14 05/26 Research Conclusion
15 06/02 Conference Week
16 06/09 Final Presentation-1(check Literature Database)
17 06/16 Final Presentation-2
18 06/23 Final Exam Week (final paper due)
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Attendance 10%
2. In Class Assignments 20%
3. Final Presentation 20%
4. Literature Database 5%
5. Final Research Paper 35%
6. Submission Proof for a Journal or Conference. 10%
